title: emissions
extract: Emission of air pollutants, notably: Flue gas, gas exiting to the atmosphere via a flue. Exhaust gas, flue gas generated by fuel combustion. Emission of greenhouse gases, which absorb and emit.
extract_html: Emission of air pollutants, notably: Flue gas, gas exiting to the atmosphere via a flue. Exhaust gas, flue gas generated by fuel combustion. Emission of greenhouse gases, which absorb and emit.
